template<class Matrix, class Vector, class Preconditioner, class Real, class Type>
int CHEBY (  const Matrix &  A,
Vector &  x,
const Vector &  b,
const Preconditioner &  M,
int &  max_iter,
Real &  tol,
Type  eigmin,
Type  eigmax
) 
  

00029 {
00030   Real resid;
00031   Type alpha, beta, c, d;
00032   Vector p, q, z;
00033 
00034   Real normb = norm(b);
00035   Vector r = b - A * x;
00036 
00037   if (normb == 0.0)
00038     normb = 1;
00039   
00040   if ((resid = norm(r) / normb) <= tol) {
00041     tol = resid;
00042     max_iter = 0;
00043     return 0;
00044   }
00045 
00046   c = (eigmax - eigmin) / 2.0;
00047   d = (eigmax + eigmin) / 2.0;
00048 
00049   for (int i = 1; i <= max_iter; i++) {
00050     z = M.solve(r);                 // apply preconditioner
00051 
00052     if (i == 1) {
00053       p = z;
00054       alpha = 2.0 / d;
00055     } else {
00056       beta = c * alpha / 2.0;       // calculate new beta
00057       beta = beta * beta;
00058       alpha = 1.0 / (d - beta);     // calculate new alpha
00059       p = z + beta * p;             // update search direction
00060     }
00061 
00062     q = A * p;
00063     x += alpha * p;                 // update approximation vector
00064     r -= alpha * q;                 // compute residual
00065 
00066     if ((resid = norm(r) / normb) <= tol) {
00067       tol = resid;
00068       max_iter = i;
00069       return 0;                     // convergence
00070     }
00071   }
00072 
00073   tol = resid;
00074   return 1;                         // no convergence
00075 }
